dt: {bc}capable of being easily led, taught, or controlled {bc}{sx|docile||}

pt: {sc}obedient{/sc} {sc}docile{/sc} {sc}tractable{/sc} {sc}amenable{/sc} mean submissive to the will of another. {sc}obedient{/sc} implies compliance with the demands or requests of one in authority.
{sc}docile{/sc} implies a predisposition to submit readily to control or guidance.
{sc}tractable{/sc} suggests having a character that permits easy handling or managing.
{sc}amenable{/sc} suggests a willingness to yield or cooperate because of a desire to be agreeable or because of a natural open-mindedness.

shortdef: capable of being easily led, taught, or controlled : docile
easily handled, managed, or wrought : malleable
